properties.areaDesc: Caribbean Waters of Puerto Rico from 10 NM to 17N; Mona Passage Southward to 17N
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 16 at 4:21PM AST until February 19 at 8:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...Hazardous marine conditions are expected beginning Monday
morning...

.A northerly swell with enhanced winds will result in hazardous
seas beginning Monday, and lasting at least through Wednesday.
Most of our local waters will be impacted by this upcoming swell.

* WHAT...Seas 5 to 7 feet, building to 6 to 8 by Tuesday morning
with east winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt.

* WHERE...Caribbean Waters of Puerto Rico from 10 NM to 17N and
Mona Passage Southward to 17N.

* WHEN...From 2 AM Tuesday to 8 PM AST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TUESDAY TO 8 PM AST WEDNESDAY
